leaflet.candidateName: James Holmes, Simon Withey, Krystal Miller

messages.title: YOUR TRINITY WARD CONSERVATIVE CANDIDATES
messages.content: We called to introduce the Conservative Council candidates in your ward. We took over the Council in 2006, after 16 years of Labour control, during which time they: Ran out of money and reserves Increased Council Tax by more than the rate of inflation Allowed school standards to be far below the London average Neglected our neighbourhoods.

Since 2006 The Conservatives have: Reduced Council Tax in 2010 and kept the overall rise below inflation Improved GSCE results by 20% Increased bursarys in secondary and provided 650+ free school places for our boroughs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze Council Tax for two years under a Conservative government
Improve GCSE results by another 20% and build a new primary school
Double the number of Special Constables with full police powers
Introduce 24-hour town-centre street cleaning and more Saturday bin collections
Freeze residents' parking permits and tighten restrictions on roadworks

mentions.candidate: James Holmes, Simon Withey, Krystal Miller

issues.education: Improve GCSE results by another 20% and build a new primary school
issues.governance: Freeze Council Tax for two years under a Conservative government
